the ext-images-default.zip file contains the resources/themes/images/default directory of ext 4.0.2a
the ext-css.zip file contains the resources/css directory of ext 4.0.2a
the ext-lang.zip file contains the locale directory of ext 4.0.2a
the ext-js.zip file contains the .js files in the root directory of ext 4.0.2a

http://extjs.cachefly.net/ext-4.0.2a-gpl.zip
see also http://www.sencha.com/products/js/

The images will be extracted to delivery/webserver/OpenPetraOrg.ext/images when running nant startWebServer.
The other files are also copied to the right places in delivery/webserver.
